feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-21T15:54:55.112808Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;痴呆风险与中年血液蛋白失衡有关</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02374-2</id>; <updated>;202 3-07-21T13:53:29.061908Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02374-2"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media .nature.com/lw767/magazine-assets/d41586-023-02374-2/d41586-023-02374-2_25825424.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;一项研究发现，如果中年期间蛋白质水平不平衡，则与痴呆症的发展有关。这些发现可能有助于开发新的诊断测试或治疗痴呆症的方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dementia-risk-linked-to-blood- Protein-imbalance-in-middle-age" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36813564" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernew s.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Primo – 带有 Svelte 块、代码编辑器和 SSG 的可视化 CMS</stitle>; <id>;https://primocms.org</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T12:53:29.235401Z</updated>; <link href="https://primocms.org"/>; <author>; <name>;mmmateo</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mmmateo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://kdtzsoeklezpgshpzqtf.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/public/images/7c1dc1a3-c9eb-4364-b31b-951ecfc2641d/1682111950401Screen %20Shot%202023-04-21%20at%205.17.27%20PM.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：122px；" />;<br />;邀请任意数量的协作者作为开发人员或内容编辑者，并一起编辑您的页面。在单个服务器上创建无限数量的网站并在几秒钟内启动新网站。将您的站点部署到 Github 存储库。从那里您可以轻松地将其部署到任何网络主机。使用 Primo 的免费主题之一开始运行，并使用 CSS 变量在几秒钟内对其进行自定义。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-primo-a-visual-cms-with-svelte-blocks-a-code-editor-and-ssg" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36813086" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry ry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我用 Rust 编写了一个 JVM</stitle>; <id>;https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T08:53:29.237742Z</updated>; <link href="https://and reabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/"/>; <author>; <name>;lukastyrychtr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lukastyrychtr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://andreabergia.com/images/2023/07/gc1.png" 样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：103像素；” />;<br />;我用 Rust 编写了一个 Java 虚拟机，称为 rjvm。它是一个出于学习目的而构建的玩具 JVM，而不是一个严肃的实现。它支持执行字节码指令、处理局部变量和堆栈元素以及调用方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;到 2028 年，欧盟主要高速公路上每 60 公里必须配备快速充电器</stitle>; <id>;https://www.fleeteurope.com/en/new-energies/europe/article/fast-chargers-every-60-km-key-eu-motorways?a=FJA05&t%5B0%5D=Charging&curl=1</id>; <updated>;2023-07 -21T15:13:29.238894Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.fleeteurope.com/en/new-energies/europe/article/fast-chargers-every-60-km-key-eu-motorways?a=FJA05&t%5B0%5D=Charging&curl=1"/>; <作者>; <name>;clouddrover</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycomb inator.com/user?id=clouddrover</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.fleeteurope.com/sites/default/files/styles/headlines_width_850/public/field/image/ten-t_network.jpeg?itok=T-CH65Us" style="width: 220px; height: 209px;" />;<br />;到2028年，欧盟主要高速公路上至少每60公里必须配备快速充电桩。这是欧洲议会批准的多项改善电动汽车充电的措施中最引人注目的一项。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#by-2028-there-must-be-fast-chargers-every-60-km-on-the-eus-key-motorways" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36814754" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;大型强子对撞机内部三重态磁体的淬灭导致小泄漏并产生严重后果</stitle>; <id>;https://home.cern/news/news/accelerators/accelerator-report-quench-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-small-leak-major</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21 T07:53:29.239988Z</updated>; <link href="https://home.cern/news/news/accelerators/accelerator-report-quench-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-small-leak-major"/>; <author>; <name>;untilted</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=untilted</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://cds.cern.ch/images/CERN-HOMEWEB-PHO-2023-098-1/file?size=large" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;由于电扰动，大型强子对撞机光束在碰撞仅 9 分钟后就被倾倒了。包括内部三重态磁体在内的几个超导磁体被淬灭，低温电路和绝缘真空之间出现小泄漏。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quench-of-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-a-small-leak-with-major-consequences" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811018" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < Entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纸飞机想法和技巧</stitle>; <id>;https://www.foldnfly.com/runway.php</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T08:53:29.241048Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.foldnfly.com/runway.php"/>; <作者>; <name >;mottiden</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mottiden</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.foldnfly.com/images/tips/ruler.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;跑道是一个提供提示、技巧和想法的资源，可最大限度地发挥纸飞机的性能。它提供了有关精确折叠、对称性、添加胶带或订书钉进行改进、调整质心、机翼设计、转向调整以及尝试不同纸张尺寸和类型的指导。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#paper-airplane-ideas-and-tips" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784032" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;能够看到专业知识是一个值得追求的里程碑（2022 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://commoncog.com/seeing-expertise-milestone-worth-aiming-for/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T07:53:29.242079Z</updated>; <link href="https://commoncog.com/seeing-expertise-milestone-worth-aiming-for/ "/>; <author>; <name>;nickwritesit</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nickwritesit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://commoncog.com/content/images/2022/04/kl_judo_sankaku_class.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;专家比新手能看到更多的专业知识梯度，这使得新手很难理解为什么专家擅长他们所做的事情。这种缺乏了解还导致不同技能水平的自由职业者收取的费率存在差异。客户大多是新手，无法区分技能树高端的从业者，而专家却可以。这意味着在达到一定的技能水平后，通过经验实现的任何改进对于客户来说都是不可见的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ability-to-see-expertise-is-a-milestone-worth-aiming-for-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784864" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;印度大米出口禁令引发人们对全球粮食价格上涨的担忧</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/business/2023/jul/21/india-ban-on-rice-exports-raises-fear-of-global-food-price-rises</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T15:02:2 9.243150Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/business/2023/jul/21/india-ban-on-rice-exports-raises-fear-of-global-food-price-rises"/>; <author>; <name>;vanburen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=vanburen</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/67d5885b37a9b4228bd5ccae832234a5fd025419/23_161_5278_3169/master/5278.jpg?width=465&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;印度禁止非巴斯马蒂白米出口，以遏制国内通胀，引发人们对全球粮食价格进一步上涨的担忧。该禁令不适用于较高等级的印度香米，但非印度香米白米约占印度大米出口的 25%。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#indias-ban-on-rice-exports-raises-fear-of-global-food-price-rises" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36814627" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;115华氏度的高温正在杀死撒丁岛的手机</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-07-19/dying-phones-wilting-cyclists-epicenter-of-europe-heat-wave-has-grim-warnings</id>; <更新>;2023-07 -21T14：53：29.244176Z </更新>; <link href =“https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2023-07-19/dying-phones-wilting-cyclists-epicenter-of-europe-heat-wave-has-grim-warnings”/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong </ name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.bwbx.io/images/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/i.5kAhDiGVPk/v3/1200x800.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;彭博将决策者与信息、人员和想法的动态网络连接起来，快速、准确地提供世界各地的商业和金融信息、新闻和见解 将决策者连接到信息、人员和想法的动态网络，彭博快速、准确地提供世界各地的商业和财务信息、新闻和见解 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-115f-heat-is-killing-phones-in-sardinia" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36814351" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Odin 的小乐趣</stitle>; <id>;http://www.zannzen.com/blog/small_joys_with_odin _1/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T10:53:29.245130Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.zannzen.com/blog/small_joys_with_odin_1/"/>; <author>; <name>;lerno</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lerno</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Odin 是 C-就像面向数据且务实的语言。它是迄今为止经历过最少“wtf”的系统编程语言。 Odin 具有内置的生活质量功能，例如用于标志和数组编程的位集。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#small-joys-with-odin" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812175" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;消失的家庭：残酷基因突变阴影下的生活</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/07/20/magazine/family-genics-frontotemporal-dementia.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T13:53:29.245949Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/202 3/07/20/magazine/family-genics-frontotemporal-dementia.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fortran77</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fortran77</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/07/23/magazine/23mag-Gene-1/2 3mag-Gene-1-articleLarge-v5.jpg？quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="宽度：220px；高度：262px；" />;<br />;Barb 的家人一直受到一种神秘疾病的困扰，这种疾病影响到了她的母亲和她的两个姐妹。在发现病情可能是额颞叶痴呆 (FTD) 后，巴布开始寻找答案，并联系美国国立卫生研究院和梅奥诊所进行检测。最终，他们发现这个家庭携带 ta 基因突变，使他们与同样的医疗问题联系在一起。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-vanishing-family-life-in-the-shadow-of-a-cruel-genic-mutation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809457" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Turborepo 如何从 Go 移植到 Rust</stitle>; <id>;https://vercel.com/blog/how-turborepo-is-porting-from-go-to-rust?nxtPslug=how-turborepo-is-porting-from-go-to-rust</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T14:53:29。 246775Z</updated>; <link href="https://vercel.com/blog/how-turborepo-is-porting-from-go-to-rust?nxtPslug=how-turborepo-is-porting-from-go-to-rust"/>; <作者>; <name>;hardwaregeek</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hardwaregeek</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://vercel.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fassets.vercel.com%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fcontentful%2Fimage%2Fe5382hct74si%2F41iFVCHuBs1rQn4jTfRGIt%2F3bd01ff806eb9ab64b31445dad31cd6c%2 FOG_Image_____Template__1_.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_8RDicLqKo7Q33PKL8CRboggnovCT" style="宽度：220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;Turborepo 正在以增量方式从 Go 移植到 Rust，目标是保持代码行为相同。移植过程引入了复杂性，但允许持续的功能交付。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-turborepo-is-porting-from-go-to-rust" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycom binator.com/item?id=36814019" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纳秒时间戳冲突很常见</stitle>; <id>;https://www.evanjones.ca/nanosecond-collisions.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-2 1T07:53:29.248423Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.evanjones.ca/nanosecond-collisions.html"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我编写了一个小测试程序来比较连续时间戳和“绝对”记录的绝对时间戳之间的相对差异时间和 Go 中的“单调时钟”。该行为取决于系统，在 Mac OS X 和 Linux 上观察到的结果不同。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nanosecond-timestamp-collisions-are-common" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810818" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;告诉 HN：立即升级您的 Metabase 安装</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/metabase/metabase/releases/tag/v0.46.6.1</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T10:53:29.250087Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/metabase/metabase/releases/tag/v0.46. 6.1"/>; <author>; <name>;周通</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zhoutong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/64d3f8f41e70c382db665523f561cba29dbc986ca723661bf2a8d12d9d3 62f46/metabase/metabase/releases/tag/v0.46.6.1" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;最近发现的安全漏洞几乎肯定会影响您，我们建议您立即升级元数据库安装。您可以下载该版本的 .jar，或者获取有关 Docker 的最新信息。请确保在升级之前备份您的元数据库数据库！需要帮忙？查看我们的升级说明。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tell-hn-upgrade-your-metabase-installation-immediately" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812256" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Fly.io Postgres 集群已停机 3 天，没有任何消息</stitle>; <id>;https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:2T9NpG8thZgJ:https://community.fly.io/t/service-interruption-cant-destroy-machine-deploy-or-restart/14227&cd=9&hl=en&ct=cl nk&gl=au</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T23:53:29.251777Z</更新>; <link href="https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:2T9NpG8thZgJ:https://community.fly.io/t/service-interruption-cant-destroy-machine-deploy-or-restart/14227&cd= 9&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=au"/>; <作者>; <name>;burnerbob</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=burnerbob</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://global.discourse-cdn.com/business7/uploads/fly1/original/2X/6/6c0156ccc5696c58a7 20d8d900de3fd31ca2f109.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 109px;" />;<br />;Fly.io Postgres 集群已关闭 3 天，公司没有任何通信。用户无法重新启动或销毁已停止的机器实例，并且他们的应用程序和数据库遇到问题。人们对 Fly.io 缺乏信息和更新感到沮丧和担忧。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fly-io-postgres-cluster-down-for-3-days-no-word-from-them-about -it" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808296" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;90 年代互联网：在线 20 小时触发来自 ISP 总裁的电子邮件</s标题>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/07/the-90s-internet-when-20-hours-online-triggered-an-email-from-my-isps-president/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T13:53:29.252586Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/202 3/07/the-90s-internet-when-20-hours-online-triggered-an-email-from-my-isps-president/"/>; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/up加载/2023/07/banj-edwards-terminally-online2-800x450.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;1998 年，收到 ISP 总裁发来的关于在线超过 20 小时的电子邮件是不寻常的。互联网接入并不总是在线，每一条被占用的电话线都意味着另一个客户无法使用它。该电子邮件要求用户在每次会话后断开连接以共享资源。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#90s-internet-when-20-hours-online-triggered-an-email -from-my-isps-president" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36813210" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;子像素距离变换</stitle>; <id>;https:// acko.net/blog/subpixel-distance-transform/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T02:53:29.253381Z</updated>; <link href="https://acko.net/blog/subpixel-distance-transform/"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://acko.net/files/esdt/cover.jpg”风格=“宽度：220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了有符号距离场 (SDF) 在文本渲染中的使用。它解释了生成 SDF 的过程以及实现亚像素精度所面临的挑战。作者还描述了他们的项目 Use.GPU 中使用的一种新颖的亚像素精确距离变换 (ESDT)。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sub-pixel-distance-transform" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809404" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FedNow 上线</stitle>; <id>;https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other202307 20a.htm</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T15:53:29.254225Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other20230720a.htm"/>; <作者>; <name>;lavp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lavp</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.federalreserve.gov/images/social-media/social-default-image-opengraph.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;美联储宣布其新的即时支付系统 FedNow 服务现已上线。该工具允许银行和信用社为客户即时转账，使日常支付更快、更方便。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fednow-is-live" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36801491" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;重新审视“Cansole”，因为我的电视没有合适的连接器</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.jgc.org/2023/07/revisiting-cansole-my-silly-pong -game.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T08:53:29.255152Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.jgc.org/2023/07/revisiting-cansole-my-silly-pong-game.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;jgrahamc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jgrahamc</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEinVSvft8sROXwwRAOm1kxwamwfS_9EbqjaU6oGxF7p6t8_Wu0BRijsJPLV9zXcPeEgVz_0Bc0rkpsC0soHcCHNniS 9UXYFhkEVg_SOlYibzUZI21jDs7sl4rOcBf65Ceu_WIhr5J7GOhzQRdjcw897IGDletiPTPMt3BwWHRbWg-GGZfuwpc6XoQ/w640-h480/Untitled.002.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;早在 2011 年，Cansole 是一个罐装视频游戏机，它是使用 Arduino Pro、电阻器和来自 M&S 的甜罐子创建的。但是，作者最近发现他们的电视只有 HDMI 输入，因此他们订购了一个复合到 HDMI 转换器。Cansole 使用连接到 RCA 连接器的两个电阻器生成黑白复合视频图像。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#revisit ing-the-cansole-because-my-tv-doesn-t-have-the-right-connectors" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783062" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;LLM星座</stitle>; <id>;https://llmconstellation.olafblitz.repl.co/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T05:53:29.256161Z</updated>; <link href="https://llmconstellation.olafblitz.repl.co/"/>; <author>; <name>;fzliu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=fzliu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llm-constellation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810230" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hipgnosis，改变唱片套的设计师</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/film/2023/jul/03/anton-corbijn-hipgnosis-film-pink-floyd-led-zeppelin</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T01:53:29.256934Z </更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/film/2023/jul/03/anton-corbijn-hipgnosis-film-pink-floyd-led-zeppelin"/>; <作者>; <name>;8bitsrule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=8bitsrule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim. co.uk/img/media/43bf707f76869042b60eb12f6a5f68427c96a378/1110_156_2557_2557/master/2557.jpg?width=120&dpr=1&s=none" style="width: 220px;高度：220px;" />;<br />;以其摄影和音乐视频而闻名的安东·科尔宾 (Anton Corbijn) 执导了一部关于专辑封面设计先驱 Hipgnosis 唱片封套的纪录片。该纪录片采访了 Pink Floyd、Led Zeppelin 和 Paul McCartney 等乐队和艺术家，展示了 Hipgnosis 的创意和创意组合。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hipgnosis-the-designers -who-changed-the-record-sleeve" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797324" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;数据泄露暴露了 4k Roblo 的个人信息x 开发人员</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/21/23802742/roblox-data-leak-developer-personal-information-expose</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T12:53:29.257697Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/21/2 3802742/roblox-data-breach-leak-developer-personal-information-expose"/>; <author>; <name>;amalinovic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=amalinovic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/0x0:2040x1360/2 400x1600/过滤器:焦点(1020x680:1021x681):格式(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/24369733/STK146_Roblox.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;泄露的数据包含家庭住址、电话号码、出生日期，甚至 T 恤尺寸等敏感信息。在一次影响 Roblox 开发者会议与会者的数据泄露事件后，数千名 Roblox 创作者的敏感信息被曝光，据称该公司至少两年未披露该信息。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#data-breach-exposes-personal-information-of-4k -roblox-developers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812765" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;从头开始重新思考基础设施即代码</stitle>; <id>;https ://nathanpeck.com/rethinking-infrastruct-as-code-from-scratch/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T12:53:29.258510Z</updated>; <link href="https://nathanpeck.com/rethinking-infrastruct-as-code-from-scratch/"/>; <author>; <name>;dguo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=dguo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nathanpeck.com/images/nathanpeck.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;最近，人们非常关注基础设施复杂性和基础设施即代码的现状。虽然这个领域有许多令人印象深刻的项目，但仍然需要改进基础设施的开发和管理。基础设施即代码语言和工具辅助生成器正在朝着正确的方向迈出步伐，但它们在处理云的底层复杂性方面从根本上是不可扩展的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rethinking-infrastruct-as -code-from-scratch" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812848" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;研究发现微波加热容器时会释放数十亿纳米塑料</ stitle>; <id>;https://news.unl.edu/newsrooms/today/article/nebraska-study-finds-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T03:53:29.259300Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.unl.edu/newsrooms/today/article/nebra ska-study-finds-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving/"/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://news.unl.edu/sites/default/files/styles/large_aspect/public/media/Hero_3 23.jpg?itok=VrSN38Hg" style="宽度: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;微波塑料婴儿食品容器会释放大量塑料颗粒，包括每平方厘米容器数十亿个纳米塑料和数百万个微塑料。食用这些颗粒对健康的影响仍不清楚，但实验表明它们可能对肾细胞有毒。了解食物中塑料颗粒的数量并限制接触它们非常重要。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#study-find s-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving-containers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809565" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">; 21世纪论文中的17世纪字体</stitle>; <id>;https://www.linyangchen.com/Typography-Fell-Types-font</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T21:53:29.260075Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.linyangchen.com/Typography-Fell-Types-font"/>; <author>; <name>;_e macsomancer_</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=_emacsomancer_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://photos.smugmug.com/photos/i-G9xQbXV/0/X3/i-G9xQbXV-X3.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 266px;" />;<br />;作者在博士论文中讨论了他们对数字字体的不满以及对模拟凸版印刷的方法的探索。他们发现了 Fell 字体，这是 Caslon 所源自的原始字体的数字化版本，并在论文中使用了它。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-17th- century-font-in-a-21st- century-论文" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36807108" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人文学者希望学生了解互联网的哪些内容</stitle>; <id>;https://computinged .wordpress.com/2023/07/17/what-humanities-scholars-want-students-to-know-about-the-internet-alternative-paths-for-alternative-endpoints/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T04:53:29.260851Z</更新>; <link href="https://computinged.wordpress.com/2023/0 7/17/what-humanities-scholars-want-students-to-know-about-the-internet-alternative-paths-for-alternative-endpoints/"/>; <author>; <name>;panic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=panic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://computinged.files.wordpress.com/202 3/07/draggedimage-10.png" style="width: 220px; height: 159px;" />;<br />;文科和理科教师希望学生了解有关互联网的基本概念，例如数据库和信息检索，而不是关注 IP 地址和数据包等技术细节。这种方法对计算机科学教育的传统课程提出了挑战。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what- humanities-scholars-want-students-to-know-about-the-internet" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;书中的校样</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proofs_from_THE_BOOK</id >; <更新>;2023-07-21T11:53:29.261616Z</更新>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proofs_from_THE_BOOK"/>; <作者>; <name>;a_imho</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=a_imho</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/8/8a/Proofs_from_THE_BOOK_cover.jpg/220px-Proofs_from_THE_BOOK_cover.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 290px;" />;<br />;Proofs from THE BOOK is a book of mathematical proofs by Martin Aigner and Günter M. Ziegler. The book is dedicated to the mathematician Paul Erdős, who often referred to 'The Book' in which God keeps the most elegant proof of each mathematical theorem. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#proofs-from-the-book" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36812317" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
